languages.text: "Кибелла, что для тебя роман с Лорд-капитаном? Часть твоего долга телохранительцы? Или то, что нарушает долг?"
"Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
languages.original_text: "Кибелла, что для тебя роман с Лорд-капитаном? Часть твоего долга телохранительцы? Или то, что нарушает долг?"

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
"Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
"Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
"Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
"Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

languages.text: "Kibellah, wie seht Ihr Euer Verhältnis zum Lord Captain? Als Teil Eurer Pflicht als Leibwache? Oder als etwas, das Eure Pflicht verletzt?"
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah, wie seht Ihr Euer Verhältnis zum Lord Captain? Als Teil Eurer Pflicht als Leibwache? Oder als etwas, das Eure Pflicht verletzt?"

languages.text: « Kibellah, comment voyez-vous votre relation avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ? Comme une partie intégrante de votre devoir en tant que garde du corps ou plutôt comme une violation de votre serment ? »
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

traits.locale_text: « Kibellah, comment voyez-vous votre relation avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ? Comme une partie intégrante de votre devoir en tant que garde du corps ou plutôt comme une violation de votre serment ? »

languages.text: «Kibellah, ¿cómo ve su relación con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán? ¿Es parte de su deber como guardaespaldas? ¿O es algo que infringe ese deber?».
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

traits.locale_text: «Kibellah, ¿cómo ve su relación con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán? ¿Es parte de su deber como guardaespaldas? ¿O es algo que infringe ese deber?».

languages.text: 「キベラ。ロード・キャプテンとの関係性についてどう思う？ボディーガードの任務の内か？それとも任務に反するものか？」
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

traits.locale_text: 「キベラ。ロード・キャプテンとの関係性についてどう思う？ボディーガードの任務の内か？それとも任務に反するものか？」

languages.text: “绮贝菈，你怎么看待你与舰长大人之间的关系？这是身为保镖的职责吗？还是说，这违背了你的职责？”
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈，你怎么看待你与舰长大人之间的关系？这是身为保镖的职责吗？还是说，这违背了你的职责？”

languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"

languages.text: "Kibellah, Lord Kaptan ile ilişkini nasıl görüyorsun? Koruması olarak vazifenin bir parçası şeklinde mi yoksa bu vazifeyi hiçe sayan bir şey olarak mı?"
languages.original_text: "Kibellah, how do you see your relationship with the Lord Captain? As part of your duty as a bodyguard? Or as something that violates that duty?"
